item.description:
[This is a DfA-Boston event]

Gather round the barbecue for a relaxed Sunday afternoon of socializing with a bit of political action thrown in! We'll be talking about the growing effort to stand up to Wal-Mart, the $10-billion-dollar behemoth that affects all of our lives and the fabric of our communities. As discussed at the June Meetup,

For more information, see http://dfa.meetup.com...
item.name: Wal-Mart Watch and Community Action House Party!
